titles.title: Upskilling and Retraining Assistance Act
Upskilling and Retraining Assistance Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and modify employer educational assistance programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Upskilling and Retraining Assistance Act
This bill increases to $12,000 in 2020-2021, the exclusion from employee gross income, for income tax purposes, of employer-paid educational assistance programs.
The bill also expands the definition of educational equipment provided to an employee to include education-related tools and technology and other equipment (e.g., hand tools, computers, software, licensure fees).
